import React, {useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import logoImg from './../../assets/logo.svg' import {FiPower, FiTrash2} from 'react-icons/fi' import api from './../../services/api' import './style.css' export default function Profile(){ const ongName = localStorage.getItem('ongName'); const ongId = localStorage.getItem('ongId'); const [incidents, setIncidents] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ api.get('profile', { headers: { authorization: ongId } }).then(repsonse=>{ setIncidents(repsonse.data) }) }, [ongId]); return (
Bem Vinda, {ongName} Cadastrar Novo Caso
